text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the MSI GT Series GT63 TITAN-032 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Elden Ring. The build quality of the MSI GT Series GT63 TITAN-032 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GT Series GT63 TITAN-032 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Starfield. The build quality of the MSI GT Series GT63 TITAN-032 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the MSI GT Series GT63 TITAN-032 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
